headline: Show HN: Semdle – a novel AI /NLP powered, semantic-based word game
description:
Semdle, is a novel Artificial Intelligence (NLP) powered, semantic-based word game. It's like Wordle, but with a twist - you have to guess words with higher semantic score (closest in meaning) to find the hidden word.

What is semantic and example? Semantics is the study of meaning in language. It can be applied to entire texts or to single words. For example, "destination" and "last stop" technically mean the same thing, but students of semantics analyze their subtle shades of meaning.

How to Play ~ Guess the hidden word in 20 tries. ~ One hint word is provided at the start of game to get you started. ~ Each guess must be a valid English word. Hit the enter button to submit. ~ For each guess, a semantic similarity score shows how close your guess was to the hidden word. ~ Use additional 4 hints as needed.

Challenge and fun aspects ~ The game uses GPT-3 APIs from OpenAI to compute the dynamic semantic score for each guess word. The hints too are generated dynamically using GPT-3 prompts. ~ There are infinite paths to successfully completing the game. As such, the game play is unique to each player. ~ The game play allows implicit multiple strategies for players to discover and apply. ~ The skill is to use limited hints, and guess words with higher semantic score to reach the goal. ~ The game score can be computed and shared based on combination of number of tries and hints used (not yet implemented in beta).

This is currently in beta and I would love to get constructive feedback. So go ahead and give it a try - and feel free to share it with friends!

http://167.71.1.193/

Cheers! Sandeep Khomne
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Semdle - 一个新颖的人工智能/NLP驱动的、基于语义的文字游戏
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Semdle - 一個新穎的人工智能/NLP驅動的、基於語義的文字遊戲
description_zh-Hans:
Semdle，是一个新颖的人工智能（NLP）驱动的、基于语义的文字游戏。它就像Wordle，但有一个转折--你必须猜出语义分数较高的单词（意思最接近），以找到隐藏的单词。

什么是语义和例子？ 语义学是对语言中意义的研究。它可以应用于整个文本或单个单词。例如，"目的地"和"最后一站"在技术上的意思是一样的，但是语义学的学生会分析其微妙的含义。

如何玩？ ~ 猜测隐藏的单词，需要20次尝试。 ~ 游戏开始时提供一个提示词，让你开始。 ~ 每个猜测必须是一个有效的英语单词。按下回车键即可提交。 ~ 对于每个猜测，语义相似度得分显示了你的猜测与隐藏单词的接近程度。 ~ 根据需要使用额外的4个提示。

挑战和乐趣方面 ~ 游戏使用OpenAI的GPT-3 APIs来计算每个猜测词的动态语义分数。提示也是使用GPT-3提示动态生成的。 ~ 有无限的路径可以成功完成游戏。因此，游戏的玩法对每个玩家来说都是独一无二的。 ~ 游戏玩法允许隐含多种策略，供玩家发现和应用。 ~ The skill is to use limited hints, and guess words with higher semantic score to reach the goal. ~ The game score can be computed and shared based on combination of number of tries and hints used (not yet implemented in beta).

This is currently in beta and I would love to get constructive feedback. So go ahead and give it a try - and feel free to share it with friends!

http://167.71.1.193/

Cheers! Sandeep Khomne
